content: this shawl is a show-stopper it is perfect for traveling date nights and chilly offices wherever you take this shawl you re sure to get tons of compliments red heart® it s a wrap rainbow™ 1 ball each 9344 foggy a and 9347 whisper b susan bates® knitting needles 3 25 mm us 3 stitch marker yarn needle gauge 20 sts = 4 10 cm 46 row = 4 10 cm in garter st check your gauge use any size needles to obtain the gauge given
